General.Name: Actions Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Actions Technology Co., Ltd., a fabless semiconductor company, designs and produces SoCs for portable multimedia products in China. It offers integrated chips for Bluetooth headsets, speakers, and transmitters; portable audio and video products; intelligent voice interaction; and Bluetooth voice remote controls. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Zhuhai, China.
General.Address: No. 1, Ke Ji Si Road, Zhuhai, China, 519085
